snippet.title: Evolution: From the little light - Trailer
snippet.description:
A small creature is born in the depths of the ocean, beginning its journey for survival in a ruthless world. 

Embark on a 2D adventure full of exploration and puzzles, making crucial decisions, facing dangers and discovering the hidden secrets of evolution.

Play the demo and wishlist on Steam now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2710880/Evolution_From_the_little_light/

Follow us!
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mysterioushat_studio/
Twitter: https://x.com/Mysterious_Hat
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@mysterious_hat
